backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend canister with user profile management, inquiry submission, and admin-gated query endpoints, all protected by an access control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the EnrollmentSection component was fixed to always visibly render the athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com email address regardless of form state.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of short summaries for every frontend source file, describing each component's purpose and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes used across the shadcn/ui component system.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections (Navigation, Hero through Enrollment, Footer) into a single-page marketing layout.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsSecti: Renders a grid of eight diagnostic test cards with badge labels and descriptions, plus a feature image and a highlighted cardiac/CCTA card.
frontend/src/components/EnrollmentSectio: Enrollment inquiry form with validation and backend submission via useSubmitInquiry, with the contact email rendered outside the conditional success block so it is always visible.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Renders eight FAQ entries using a shadcn/ui Accordion component with collapsible answers covering program, pricing, and medical topics.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the Velocity Prime logo, smooth-scroll nav links, copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, brand headline, tagline, two CTA buttons (Apply / Learn More), and a stats strip showing key program numbers.
frontend/src/components/MonitoringSectio: Displays an 8-card grid of monitored health areas (sleep, nutrients, hormones, etc.) with icons and descriptions, under a 'What We're Watching For' heading.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware background, desktop nav links, an Apply CTA button, and a collapsible mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Pricing section showing a single $12,000 6-month program card with a full list of inclusions, a pharmacy cost disclaimer, and an Apply CTA button.
frontend/src/components/ProblemSection.t: Section outlining six common athlete problems (overtraining, deficiencies, poor sleep, etc.) in a card grid, followed by a callout positioning Velocity Prime as the solution.
Renders a 6-month program timeline section with 5 alternating left/right steps displayed over a dark background image, each showing phase, title, timing, and description.
frontend/src/components/ValueProposition: Displays a three-pillar 'What We Do' section with icons and descriptions covering baseline assessment, continuous monitoring, and performance intervention.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context and custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a `useSubmitInquiry` mutation hook that submits a user inquiry form to the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Barlow fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines dark-first OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the design system along with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the Velocity Prime frontend, extending the default theme with custom brand colors (vp tokens using oklch), fonts (Barlow/Barlow Condensed), shadows, border radii, and keyframe animations, plus plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state document (version 7) describing Velocity Prime as a concierge sports medicine marketing/enrollment site, listing architectural notes, known issues (email not displaying), and all existing implemented features with their IDs and requirement references.
